articles.title: Vietnam orders Netflix to remove Australian spy show over South China Sea map - GMA News Online
articles.description: Netflix Inc has removed Australian spy drama "Pine Gap" from its services in Vietnam after a complaint from broadcast authorities in the Southeast Asian country about the appearance of a map which depicts Chinese claims in the South China Sea.

articles.title: Malaysia's main human trafficking crime is forced labour, US says - CNA
articles.description: Malaysia's predominant human trafficking crime is forced labour, the U.S State Department said on Friday, after downgrading the Southeast Asian country to the worst tier in its annual report on human trafficking.
